pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: :v: liuyf0188 can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).
bors r+

Pull request successfully merged into master.

  Build succeeded!

  The publicly hosted instance of bors-ng is deprecated and will go away soon.

  If you want to self-host your own instance, [instructions are here][instructions].
  For more help, visit [the forum].

  If you want to switch to GitHub's built-in merge queue, visit [their help page][gh].

  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6545996169/job/17775567202)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6545996169/job/17775566922)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6545996169/job/17775567460)

bors d+

I don't think the TODO comment should be fixed in this PR; what you have here is already great, and I think is fine to merge as-is!

The important thing was just to *record* the TODO.

Note that you can see the error message in the "Files changed" view on GitHub. In that case it tells you that the line is too long: we ask that all lines are at most 100 characters for readability, so you should simply add a line break somewhere.
thanks, now all checks are passed

```suggestion
theorem matrix_determinant_lemma (A : Matrix m m α) (U : Matrix m n α)
    (V : Matrix n m α) (hA : IsUnit A.det) :
```
Perhaps the argument `A` could be made implicit, since it is mentioned already in `hA`

> Perhaps the argument `A` could be made implicit, since it is mentioned already in `hA`

Sure, please let me know how to do it
sure, see the other suggestion

```suggestion
theorem matrix_determinant_lemma {A : Matrix m m α} (U : Matrix m n α)
```
thank you. may i ask whats the difference between explicit and implicit variable declaration?
https://leanprover.github.io/lean4/doc/implicit.html
thank you, i'll look it up

```suggestion
theorem det_add_mul {A : Matrix m m α} (U : Matrix m n α)
```
and then for convenience have `det_mul_add` proved with `add_comm` and that lemma?

The version of the lemma I was hoping for is
$$\det\left(\mathbf{A} + \mathbf{uv}^\textsf{T}\right) = \det\left(\mathbf{A}\right) + \mathbf{v}^\textsf{T}\mathrm{adj}\left(\mathbf{A}\right)\mathbf{u}$$

So I think we should keep around a TODO comment.
ok, i will amend this
Can you update the TODO comment to include this statement?
sure, will do later
(to be clear, I am not asking you to prove it; just write the statement as lean code in the comment!)
but i proved it already, you dont want it?
and also im not familiar with the naming rule, please assist in naming the mdl in lean mathlib convenstion

> but i proved it already, you dont want it?

or should i create a seperate PR you mean?
I think we were talking past each other a bit. I've added some more comments which should be clearer, and will mark this resolved.

```suggestion
/-- A generalization of the **Matrix determinant lemma** -/
```
at least according to wikipedia

```suggestion
    (A + U * V).det = A.det * (1 + V * A⁻¹ * U).det := by
```

Indents are wrong here
```suggestion
  nth_rewrite 1 [← Matrix.mul_one A]
  rwa [← Matrix.mul_nonsing_inv_cancel_left A (col u * row v),
    ←Matrix.mul_add,det_mul, ←Matrix.mul_assoc, det_one_add_mul_comm,
    ←Matrix.mul_assoc]
```

```suggestion
theorem det_add_col_mul_row {A : Matrix m m α} (hA : IsUnit A.det) (u v : m → α) :
```

```suggestion
/-- The **Matrix determinant lemma**

 TODO: show the more general version without `hA : IsUnit A.det` as
 `(A + col u * row v).det = A.det + v ⬝ᵥ (adjugate A).mulVec u`.
-/
```
Is what I was asking for before.
i see, i can start work on that

```suggestion
    det_mul, ←Matrix.mul_assoc, det_one_add_mul_comm, ←Matrix.mul_assoc]
```

```suggestion
    ←Matrix.mul_add, det_mul, ←Matrix.mul_assoc, det_one_add_mul_comm,
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(LinearAlgebra/Matrix/SchurComplement): adding matrix determinant lemma

source.title: feat: Update SchurComplement.lean by adding matrix determinant lemma
